article: Just recently I was invited to attend a ceremony to celebrate the 25th anniversary of a business owned by a very good friend of mine. The day of the _ arrived. However, because of a business appointment running over time, I knew that I was going to be late, _ I phoned to let my friend know. I arrived 20 minutes _ and my friend came out to welcome and _ me. He said he was _ to see me and had put off the _ part of the celebration, knowing that I was on my _ . As I joined the other guests, I could _ a wonderful sense of friendship, warmth and happiness in the room. _ , I had very little time to speak to more than a couple of people _ the official part of the celebration _ . In his speech , my friend welcomed all the guests on behalf of his family and team members, and then _ the majority of the people who were gathered in the room for their support and friendship over the _ 25 years. In his thank-you speech, he used a quote: Always _ with the person you took to the dance. He then went on to talk about the importance of _ loyal to those people who had supported him. He also _ that during that time many people had offered their services and even sometimes provided a _ arrangement for his business. What a great _ it was for me to continue to go to the dance with such a good friend!
